note: Political scientist--Comparative Politics (Europe & East Asia). Spent half the 2010s in Turin, Italy. Feral outlaw and natural anarchist not often inclined to do as I'm told. I am a student of anarchists, free spirits and self-organisers throughout culture and history.

This account is supportive of gender diversity and for freedom of consenting sexualities. I am pro slut, anti-capitalist and a promoter of cooperative promiscuity.

note:
KIA on twitter in defense of Ukraine. Here to finish the job. #NAFO

On a serious note, I stand for these things for all beings:

1. right to exist
2. right to free will of choice

In THAT order. No "free will" being used to deny others' right to exist. Right to existence is always first, because there is no free will if we don't exist. That's why I bonk orcs... blatant violations of both rights.
